name: expo-gaode-map-search
description: 高德地图搜索功能模块 - POI搜索、关键词搜索、周边搜索，需先安装expo-gaode-map

scripts.postinstall: node -e "try{require.resolve('expo-gaode-map');process.exit(0)}catch(e1){try{require.resolve('expo-gaode-map-navigation');process.exit(0)}catch(e2){console.error('[expo-gaode-map-search] 需要安装基础地图组件：expo-gaode-map 或 expo-gaode-map-navigation 中的任意一个。\n请执行：pnpm add expo-gaode-map 或 pnpm add expo-gaode-map-navigation');process.exit(1)}}"

author: 尚博信_王强 <wangqiang03@sunboxsoft.com> (https://github.com/TomWq)
